title: I found a botter today.
body: HEY Riot please look over 'private happii' had her twice in both my games playing as sona, does the same thing, doesn't talk except 'support please' and follows the adc around, never uses her ABILITIES, or talk to any of us in game NEITHER Does she buy any items so please investigate this.

replies.body:
http://www.lolskill.net/summoner/OCE/private%20happii/matches

lol yea, im sure hoping its a bot lol

Thank you for the report Troller4Life ( :| )

Did you report him/her at the end of the game or sent a ticket to player support?

While I appreciate you raising visibility, it's hard for us to track this on the forum (and difficult to scale).
Ok I'm glad you answer, in which part of the terms and conditions is this illegal? And what is the consequence?  Or is it legal?
